original_text: So these people went to Jesus. They said, ‘Teacher, everything that you say and everything that you teach is right. We know that. You teach everyone the same true message about what God wants us to do. You do not say something different to an important person to make him happy.
korean_text: 그들이 물어 이르되 선생님이여 우리가 아노니 당신은 바로 말씀하시고 가르치시며 사람을 외모로 취하지 아니하시고 오직 진리로써 하나님의 도를 가르치시나이다

sentences.original_text: So these people went to Jesus.
everything that you say is right.
and everything that you teach is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신이 가르치는 모든 것이 옳습니다.

sentences.original_text: You teach everyone the same true message
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 모든 사람에게 똑같은 진실된 메시지를 가르칩니다.

sentences.original_text: about what God wants us to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 우리에게 하시기를 원하시는 것에 대하여.

sentences.original_text: You do not say something different
to an important person to make him happy.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 기쁘게 하기 위해 중요한 사람에게.'
